title: Mission didn't update after the game
body:
Hi !

I just won a PvP game with herald and nashor while wearing a Worlds icon. However, my mission didn't update. (Also, it seems like I can't look at my match history. It just load forever...)

Is this a temporary issue or do I need to win another ?

Thank you for taking the time to read my problem,
Cheers

replies.body: Hey I look into this for you and I do see that you completed the mission for Baron and rift Herald.  It sounds like your network might be having a hiccup updating your info.  Give your client a restart to resync, and let me know if it's still an issue.

After the second restart, it did update the mission.

Thank you very much for that, have a nice day!
